mapper.insert: insert into PayMentMon (dateID, cId, gId, sId, newAddNum, newAddPayPlayerNum, newAddPayAllMoney, newAddPlayerARPPU, newAddPayPlayerARPPU, newPayPlayerNum, newPayAllMoney, averageNewPayMoney, activeNum, payPlayerNum, todayAllPayMoney, activeARPPU, payPlayerARPPU, allMoney ) values (#{dateID},#{cId},#{gId},#{sId},#{newAddNum},#{newAddPayPlayerNum},#{newAddPayAllMoney},#{newAddPlayerARPPU}, #{newAddPayPlayerARPPU},#{newPayPlayerNum},#{newPayAllMoney},#{averageNewPayMoney},#{activeNum}, #{payPlayerNum},#{todayAllPayMoney},#{activeARPPU},#{payPlayerNum},#{allMoney})
mapper.select: select * from PayMentMon where dateID = #{dateID} AND cId = #{cId} AND gId = #{gId} AND sId = #{sId} limit 1
mapper.update: update PayMentMon set newAddNum=#{newAddNum}, newAddPayPlayerNum=#{newAddPayPlayerNum}, newAddPayAllMoney=#{newAddPayAllMoney}, newAddPlayerARPPU=#{newAddPlayerARPPU}, newAddPayPlayerARPPU=#{newAddPayPlayerARPPU}, newPayPlayerNum=#{newPayPlayerNum}, newPayAllMoney=#{newPayAllMoney}, averageNewPayMoney=#{averageNewPayMoney}, activeNum=#{activeNum}, payPlayerNum=#{payPlayerNum}, todayAllPayMoney=#{todayAllPayMoney}, activeARPPU=#{activeARPPU}, payPlayerARPPU=#{payPlayerARPPU}, allMoney=#{allMoney} where id=#{id}
